message: Temperatures were hovering around the –13 C mark for the Icebreaker Polar Dip, a fundraiser for the SA Foundation, which raises money for a charity fighting sexual exploitation and human trafficking of women and children.

data.description: About one hundred people lucked out in Calgary on New Year's Day, with the warmest weather of the weekend as they did a polar plunge for a good cause.
data.title: Calgary Icebreaker Polar Dip raises almost $90K to fight human trafficking with
